name: Virtual Hell
description:
Welcome to the VR simulator. In just one room we simulate all kind of environments. The first of such environments, hell, has been made especially for The Indie Tales Jam. A bullet hell, with the final chalenge of beating the hound with three heads: Cerberus!

Let us know whether you can beat the game, and in which time! :D

Made by One or Two People: Two people.

All of the content in this entry was made by me / my teammate: Yes, during the jam!

Nico and Gertjan form Shoe Fisher Games. We are indie developers from the Netherlands who create a little game called WanderOut in our spare time.

If you like this game, let us know by rating it, commenting on it, or by following us on Twitter or Facebook. If we get lots of positive feedback we might continue to make this into a fully featured game. Created using the excellent Godot engine.
